Clean Cuts.name: Clean Cuts
Clean Cuts.blurb: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.
Clean Cuts.description: Innate: After casting an ability, Xayah's next 3 basic attacks penetrate through all enemies along a 900 range line, dealing 100% damage to her main target and 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) pass-through damage to other enemies.  At the end of their path, a Feather will be left in the ground for 6 seconds.
Clean Cuts.description2: Xayah can store up to 5 empowered attacks for 8 seconds, refreshed with further ability use or upon attacking buildings.
Clean Cuts.description3: Lover's Leap: If either Xayah or  Rakan is  recalling, the other may move nearby and activate their own recall to join them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's recall ends.
Clean Cuts.notes:
* On-hit effects are only applied to her selected attack target.
 PENDING FOR TEST
 Parry effects
 Xayah is  blinded

Double Daggers.name: Double Daggers
Double Daggers.blurb: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
Double Daggers.description: Active: Xayah throws two feather-blades in quick succession, dealing  physical damage, and leaving two Feathers on the ground.
Double Daggers.leveling:
Damage Per Blade:
45 / 65 / 85 / 105 / 125 (+ 50% bonus AD)
Maximum Total Damage:
90 / 130 / 170 / 210 / 250 (+ 100% bonus AD)
Double Daggers.description2: Targets hit after the first take 50% damage.
Double Daggers.leveling2:
Minimum Damage Per Blade:
22.5 / 32.5 / 42.5 / 52.5 / 62.5 (+ 25% bonus AD)
Minimum Total Damage:
45 / 65 / 85 / 105 / 125 (+ 50% bonus AD)
Double Daggers.notes:
*  Spell shields will block only a single feather blade.
 Xayah cannot basic attack for a set duration during the cast time of Double Daggers. The lock out duration is reduced by   0.007 seconds per every 1% bonus attack speed    1 second per every 140% bonus attack speed  .
As the feathers are forming, they will deal damage in a small area around Xayah's feet before firing.

Deadly Plumage.name: Deadly Plumage
Deadly Plumage.blurb: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
Deadly Plumage.description: Active: Xayah creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grants her  bonus attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for 20% damage.
Deadly Plumage.description2: If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains  30% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
Deadly Plumage.description3: If  Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage, while also gaining the bonus movement speed when Xayah strikes an enemy champion.
Deadly Plumage.notes:
* The lesser bolts count as additional sources of single target physical damage, and will apply bonus stacks of  The Black Cleaver and  Electrocute.
 The lesser bolts from  Runaan's Hurricane will also deal 20% increased damage, which is represented with additional lesser bolts being conjured from the storm. The damage of these W bolts is 20% of the fired Runaan's bolt, not of the initial auto attack.

Bladecaller.name: Bladecaller
Bladecaller.blurb: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
Bladecaller.description: Active: Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing physical damage to enemies they pass through, increased by 0% − 50% (based on critical chance). Minions take 50% damage.
Bladecaller.leveling:
Physical Damage Per Feather:
55 / 65 / 75 / 85 / 95 (+ 60% bonus AD)
Minion Damage Per Feather:
27.5 / 32.5 / 37.5 / 42.5 / 47.5 (+ 30% bonus AD)
Bladecaller.description2: Enemies take 100% − 10% (based on feathers hit) damage from a Feather.
Bladecaller.description3: Enemies hit by at least 3 Feathers are  rooted for 1.25 seconds.
Bladecaller.notes:
* This ability cannot be ranked at level 1.
 The damage dealt by Bladecaller follows a diminishing returns formula not mentioned in the ability's description, successively reducing extra damage from feathers beyond the first.
 This formula is: 
 For feathers <=10: Damage of one feather × (n − 0.1 × (n − 1) ÷ 2 × n) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.
 For feathers >=11: Damage of one feather × (5.5 + 0.1 × (n − 10)) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.

 For example, at rank 1 Bladecaller deals 55 − 302.5 (based on feathers hit).

Featherstorm.name: Featherstorm
Featherstorm.blurb: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
Featherstorm.description: Active: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming  untargetable for 1.5 seconds, during which she is still able to move, then rains down daggers which deal physical damage and leave behind a line of 5 Feathers.
